column3: Part of our superstretch collection, these high-rise skinny jeans retain their sleek silhouette wear after wear. With interior panels that lift and shape and a contour waistband that hugs the hips and prevents gaping, they'll earn a spot in your regular rotation.
column4:
Premier Skinny Ankle: high rise. Sits at the natural waist. Slim through the hip and the thigh with a skinny, cropped leg.
US size 18: approx. 11½" rise, 40¼" waist, 48" hip, and 11½" leg opening. All sizes have a 27" inseam.
Slimming interior panels lift and shape.
Contour waistband hugs the hips to enhance comfort and prevent gaping. Belt loops. Zip fly with a signature shank closure.
Five-pocket styling with a signature metal rivets. Signature "Lauren Ralph Lauren"–debossed leather patch at the back right waist.
Due to the natural characteristics of this material, the coloring may rub off onto fabrics and upholstery.
90% cotton, 9% polyester, 1% elastane.
Machine washable. Imported.
Model is 5'10"/178 cm and has a 30" waist and 45" hips. She wears a US size 14.
